question: Please help!!!! How to weigh more on a scale?
question_content: PLEASE HELP ME. I need to weigh around five pounds more on a scale without actually gaining the weight...long story. If I drink A TON of water tonight and don't pee 2morrow will that at least give me 1 or 2 pounds? PLEASEEE HELP.

answers.answer_content:
Wear layers! I don't really think the water will help much though. Maybe try eating really salty food tonight to make yourself bloat. Or eat a very heavy dinner! 

Or you can try wearing ankle weights!
drinking 2.5 litres of water before you go on the scale will make you a little more than 5 lbs heavier.  but that's alot of water, and hard to drink that much without going to the washroom.
